TextBlock.Text: OENO: Welcome to Timber Hearth, friends. You may find both our <color=orange>campsite</color> and <color=orange>mining site</color> by following the path down into the geyser mountain!
OENO: Of note: Please do not leave this warp receiver's return warp powered and unattended, as this planet is home to amphibious lifeforms that tend to swim onto land to explore the planet's surface!

OENO: If any of them were to wander onto the warp receiver, an unattended return warp could send them to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> - leaving them gravely endangered without any air supply or protection from heat.
OENO: As a result, please remember to leave something on the warp receiver to stall it from powering its return warp, until you are ready to travel back to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin!</color>
